ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors wish to thank the following individuals and organizations for their assistance with the project: Dan Olson and Jason Barnum from the Young Living Lavender Farm, Erin Riggs (UVU), Brad Chatterley, Brandon Nebeker, Callie Smith, Jingjing Li, Kaitlin Bronson, Kyle Lorenzen, Mackenzie Jones, Maquelle Tumbleson, Rex Kidman, Tracy Norton, Wayne Lee, and the D. Gary Young Research Institute for providing support and funding for this project.
